A4.text: The official 2023 estimate of the Tri-Cities MSA population is 314,253.

A5.text: The combined population of the three principal cities themselves was 228,482 according to 2023 estimates from the United States Census Bureau.

A6.text: The Tri-Cities region has a mid-sized metropolitan area of approximately 303,622 people.
